title: Cyberpunk 2077
description: An open-world, action-adventure story set in Night City, a megalopolis obsessed with power, glamour and body modification.

title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: A story-driven, open-world RPG set in a visually stunning fantasy universe full of meaningful choices and impactful consequences.

title: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: America, 1899. The end of the wild west era has begun as lawmen hunt down the last remaining outlaw gangs.

title: Hades
description: Defy the god of the dead as you hack and slash out of the Underworld in this rogue-like dungeon crawler from the creators of Bastion.

title: Stray
description: Lost, alone and separated from family, a stray cat must untangle an ancient mystery to escape a long-forgotten city.

title: Valorant
description: A 5v5 character-based tactical shooter where precise gunplay meets unique agent abilities. Blend your style and experience on a global, competitive stage.
